nodes.text: Calimondretta Control was a transport agency tasked with controlling the entries and exits of the city of Calimondretta, the largest settlement on Syned and the capital of the Arkadianate. Prior to the Siege of Calimondretta, the mercenary leader Jarrow Rusher hijacked an icecrawler "Crawler" and used it to carry two artillery cannons for the attack on Syned. He managed to evade Calimondretta's security by claiming to carry passengers from the troopship Diligence.
